latest_revision.text:
*HeatSync Labs training required for operation.
*Printer was donated by Intel to HeatSync Labs.
*First successful operation noted in Hack Your Hackerspace notes in 08/10/2017

== Documentation ==

User manual:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/j73yhen44w0xvyh/Titan1_User_Manual_v3.1.pdf


Cover build guide:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/uygd0ty4ilczprc/Kudo3D_Emerald_and_Ruby_Cover_Build_Guide_v1.2.pdf


Software manual:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/vrmvq566ulyy9f5/Kudo3D_Titan1_Windows_Software_Manual_v3.2.pdf


Firmware manual:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/11cmi2s7etwwbek/Kudo3D%20Firmware%20Update%20Manual%20v1.2.pdf


Manufacture website:

https://www.kudo3d.com/


== Software, drivers, and firmware ==

Kudo3D Titan 1 Software (v3.1) for Printer Control and Printing:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rekhjwna8gcinj0/Kudo3D_Titan1-3.1-setup.rar


USB Serial Port Driver:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/l0dep12dklspnty/Hl-340.rar


Titan1 and Titan2 Machine configuration for slicing

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4rfxxgbbpl0l1k5/Titan1_and_Titan2_Machine_configuration_for_slicing.zip


Titan 1 Firmware

https://www.dropbox.com/s/yuwl6seewnv4oyi/Kudo3D-Marlin_v2.0.rar
